verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, when he was in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>. O God <S%H430><s%>, thou art my God <S%H410><s%>; early will I seek <S%H7836><s%> thee: my soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsteth <S%H6770><s%> for thee, my flesh <S%H1320><s%> longeth <S%H3642><s%> for thee in a dry <S%H6723><s%> and thirsty <S%H5889><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, where no <S%H1097><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> is; thirsty: Heb. weary where: without water
To see <S%H7200><s%> thy power <S%H5797><s%> and thy glory <S%H3519><s%>, so as I have seen <S%H2372><s%> thee in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>.
Because thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than life <S%H2416><s%>, my lips <S%H8193><s%> shall praise <S%H7623><s%> thee.
Thus will I bless <S%H1288><s%> thee while I live <S%H2416><s%>: I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> as with marrow <S%H2459><s%> and fatness <S%H1880><s%>; and my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall praise <S%H1984><s%> thee with joyful <S%H7445><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>: marrow: Heb. fatness
When I remember <S%H2142><s%> thee upon my bed <S%H3326><s%>, and meditate <S%H1897><s%> on thee in the night watches <S%H821><s%>.
Because thou hast been my help <S%H5833><s%>, therefore in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of thy wings <S%H3671><s%> will I rejoice <S%H7442><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> followeth hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee: thy right hand <S%H3225><s%> upholdeth <S%H8551><s%> me.
But those that seek <S%H1245><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, to destroy <S%H7722><s%> it, shall go <S%H935><s%> into the lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.

They shall fall <S%H5064><s%> by the sword <S%H3027><s%> <S%H2719><s%>: they shall be a portion <S%H4521><s%> for foxes <S%H7776><s%>. They shall fall: Heb. They shall make him run out like water by the hands of

But the king <S%H4428><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in God <S%H430><s%>; every one that sweareth <S%H7650><s%> by him shall glory <S%H1984><s%>: but the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of them that speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall be stopped <S%H5534><s%>.
